DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study proceed intend international trial . Hypothesis : Daily intake selenium supplementation form selenium-enriched yeast tablet reduce risk cancer healthy individual . Objective : The objective pilot study assess viability full scale randomise trial .
DOC.criteria: WHO performance status 0 1 No active liver kidney disease ( Serum ALAT ( alanine aminotransferase ) , alkalic phosphatase , bilirubin , creatinin urea within 2 S.D laboratory reference range ) No previous cancer diagnosis No know HIVinfection Participant must understand oral write information Participant must use selenium supplementation 50 mcg/d Participant must give write consent prior inclusion
